p: Previously known antiviral and other drugs have been tried on patients without appropriate trials forced by overloaded sick patients and death in confirmed cases with COVID-19 disease. Multiple studies have currently been conducted investigating the potential cure effect, including hydroxychloroquine in combination with azithromycin, immune therapy, remdesivir, different antiviral medications, and the use of convalescent plasma of cured patients with COVID-19 [ 42â€“ 52]. Some of these drugs exhibit a potential of serious cardiac side effects, treating physicians must be aware of.
